tool_description: Emails Checker offers a simple REST-based JSON API to check and verify email addresses right at the point of entry into your system.
name: Emails Checker
title: Emails Checker

api_list.name: Check Server Connection
api_list.description: Check if server is working properly or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emails-checker.p.rapidapi.com/check_connection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emails-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
